statements: UPDATE login_attempts SET login_result = true WHERE id = 1
UPDATE login_attempts SET username = 'user123', login_time = '2022-01-10 08:30:00' WHERE id = 2
UPDATE login_attempts SET login_result = true, username = 'john_doe' WHERE id = 1
UPDATE login_attempts SET login_time = '2022-01-01 08:00:00', login_result = false WHERE username = 'jane_smith'
UPDATE login_attempts SET result = 'success' WHERE user_id = 100 AND id = 1;
UPDATE login_analysis SET last_login_time = '2022-01-01 12:00:00' WHERE user_id = 200;

UPDATE login_attempts SET result = 'success' WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE login_analysis SET login_attempts_count = login_attempts_count + 1, last_login_time = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP WHERE user_id = 5;
UPDATE login_attempts SET username = 'user1' WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE login_monitoring SET attempt_count = 3, last_attempt_timestamp = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP WHERE ip_address = '192.168.1.100';
UPDATE login_attempts SET username = 'john_doe', ip_address = '192.168.1.100', login_timestamp = '2022-10-15 08:30:00' WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE login_analysis SET success = TRUE, reason = 'Login Success', analysis_timestamp = '2022-10-15 08:35:00' WHERE id = 3;
UPDATE login_attempts SET login_status = 'success' WHERE user_id = 1;
UPDATE user_profile SET email = 'john.doe@example.com' WHERE username = 'johndoe';
UPDATE login_attempts SET login_status = 'failed' WHERE user_id = 123;
UPDATE user_profile SET email = 'test@example.com', username = 'test_user' WHERE user_id = 456;
UPDATE login_attempts SET login_status = true WHERE user_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
UPDATE login_sessions SET session_end_time = '2022-10-25 15:30:00' WHERE session_id = '223e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
UPDATE login_attempts SET login_status = false WHERE user_id = '6ba7b810-9dad-11d1-80b4-00c04fd430c8';
UPDATE login_errors SET error_description = 'Invalid credentials' WHERE user_id = '6ba7b810-9dad-11d1-80b4-00c04fd430c8';
